info.description: The GDM web service API provides a comprehensive set of RESTful methods for accomplishing the following core tasks in the GOBii Genomic Data Management (GDM) system. This manual explains the GDM web architecture and its web service operations.
info.title: GDM BrAPI

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page Token to fetch a page. nextPageToken form previous page's meta data should be used.If pageNumber is specified pageToken will be ignored. pageToken can be used to sequentially get pages faster. When an invalid pageToken is given the page will start from beginning.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Size of the page to be fetched. Default is 1000. Maximum page size is 1000

parameters.name: callSetDbId
parameters.description: ID of the CallSet to be retrieved.

parameters.name: callSetName
parameters.description: The human readable name of the CallSet to be retrieved.

parameters.name: variantSetDbId
parameters.description: The ID of the VariantSet to be retrieved.

parameters.name: sampleDbId
parameters.description: The ID of the Sample to be retrieved.

parameters.name: germplasmDbId
parameters.description: The ID of the Germplasm to be retrieved.

parameters.name: studyDbId
parameters.description: The ID of the study to be retrieved.

parameters.name: sampleName
parameters.description: The name of the sample to be retrieved.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Authentication Token

get.description: Retrieves the Callset entity having the specified ID

parameters.name: callSetDbId
parameters.description: ID of the Callset to be extracted

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Authentication Token
